channel.title: Luke, NT, The Gospel on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.
channel.description: Recent content in Luke, NT, The Gospel on Follow me and I shall make you fishers of men.

item.title: Luke 6:36-38
item.description: 36 Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful. 37 Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven: 38 Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
